post.body: the environment?
4 should be alright
Show me the science.
Is that the big hole in the ground filled with water where you put all the potential CAs and the ones that float get the job?
wednesday should work fine. any particular time?
It's all that and so much more...
If you ever want the full sureality that is the Starshio Troopers experience let me know; I'm always up for a good laugh.
I wonder why they call it that?
you want more irony? Tap water isn't clean enough to swim in, you have to fill it with chemicals first.
Me too! I love having a good internet speed and access to hulu.com
the answer to the salseman problem in re: Santa is of course, get people to buy stuff on their own.
Magic doesn't need to be efficient!
the only rationale I can think of would be to get me to buy the DVDs but that doesn't work for the newest season.
Pass it on to Fox too, I just got on a kick of watching House but only 4 episodes are online.
works for me, I put out some feelers in re: guest, but no luck so far.
sounds fine for me
@Storrence Again I'll be camping until the 1st of the year
@legmar if it's in the morning wednesday would be better, tommorow morning my mouth will be numb
@STorrence there are actually still plans to make a poster of my "Che head" with the quote "Viva la Kevolution"
works for me.
Christmas day Ilm heading out to go camping for a week. Maybe earlier in the week?
I hate it when people do that. Just talk like a human being.
It's hard to contact my family when they all leave their phones at home.
New post on my blog: I Should Probably Post More http://quest4pi.livejournal.com/24387.html
laying on the floor on my back because sitting up is painful. Chronic unexplained back pain is super annoying.
sitting around the house being bored and watching TV because nobody's here.
Boy I sure had fun at the dentist today! Psyche!
And I don't want no backtalk about how a black hole already does stuff with time. I don't care.
I just killed an hour and a half surfing TvTropes.org that place is like a black hole, but for time.
I don't think tWit did the KTXT thing...
I think I just missed TWiT cast about KTXT, they're talking about in the chat. Also I'm home from camp.
just wrapped the weekender; will be heading out soon.
20 wings, an order of fried pickles, 1/2 pound of peel and eat shrimp, 6 mini burgers and 3 pitchers of Blue Moon later, we are back home.
going to Hooters with the family for my parent's 27th anniversary. Yes, my family *is* cooler than yours.
Going to bed earlier than expected because my cat says it's time.
Sitting in exam room room 14 waiting to be inspected.
I'm going to bed; I'll deal with reality tomorrow.
I can't eat anything for the rest of the night. Yay Bloodwork in the morning!
Playing Half life 2 episode 2
I can't stop watching videos on hulu.com because I know I won't be able to do so when I get back to my apartment
